      • horizSplitByCateg

        public GroupReportData horizSplitByCateg(java.lang.String columnName)
                                  throws UnidentifiedItemException,
                                         IncompatibleColumnException
        Description copied from class: ReportData
        Hierarchy generator. This method splits horizontally a report into subReports, based on categories (hierarchies). A category is a grouping factor here. The source report to be splitted is always a ColumnReportData while the destination report is always a GroupReportData holding one or more ColumnReportDataS. A => D (B,C) where A = C u B, D is the group report and A, B, C column reports The grouping is generic and does not take care of any kind of internal hierarchy order, other than the one specified in the report wizard. However the behavior can be changed easily. Filtering of cells is supported. Thus whenever several ColumnReports are created from one source ColumnReport, the cells are not copied verbatim but through a filter function
        Specified by:
        horizSplitByCateg in class ReportData<ReportData>
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnidentifiedItemException
        IncompatibleColumnException
        See Also:
        Cell.#filter(Cell, java.util.Set)
